Kaps.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to Initialize, calculate the RHS, and calculate the Jacobian
00003 ! of the Kaps problem (Dekker 7.5.2 pp. 215 (Kaps problem   : Index 1)) 
00004 !******************************************************************************
00005 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00006 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90        *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00007 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90     *CONTAINS VARIABLES AND ALLOCATION ROUTINES
00008 !******************************************************************************
00009       module Kaps_mod
00010       private
00011       public :: Kaps
00012       contains
00013       subroutine Kaps(nveclen,neq,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,resE_vec,resi_vec,akk)
00014 
00015       use precision_vars,    only: wp
00016       use control_variables, only: temporal_splitting,probname,xjac,var_names,&
00017      &                             tol,dt_error_tol,uvec,uexact,programstep
00018 
00019       implicit none; save
00020 !-----------------------VARIABLES----------------------------------------------
00021       integer, parameter     :: vecl=2
00022 
00023       !INIT vars
00024       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: ep
00025       real(wp), intent(inout) :: dt
00026       integer,  intent(  out) :: nveclen,neq
00027       real(wp), intent(  out) :: tfinal
00028       integer,  intent(in   ) :: iDT
00029 
00030       real(wp)                :: tmp, epI
00031 
00032       !RHS vars
00033       real(wp), dimension(vecl), intent(  out) :: resE_vec,resi_vec
00034       
00035       !Jacob vars
00036       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: akk
00037 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     
00039       Program_Step_Select: select case(programstep)
00040         !**Pre-initialization. Get problem name and vector length**
00041         case('INITIALIZE_PROBLEM_INFORMATION')
00042           nvecLen = vecl
00043           neq = vecl
00044           probname='Kaps     '  
00045           tol=1.0e-12_wp
00046           dt_error_tol=1.0e-11_wp
00047               
00048           allocate(var_names(neq))
00049           var_names(:)=(/'Algebraic   ', 'Differential'/)    
00050           
00051         !**Initialization of problem information**        
00052         case('SET_INITIAL_CONDITIONS')
00053        
00054         !Time information
00055         dt = 0.5_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20.0_wp) ! timestep
00056         tfinal = 1.0_wp                   ! final time
00057 
00058         !*Exact Solution**        
00059         tmp = exp(-tfinal)
00060         uexact(1) = tmp*tmp
00061         uexact(2) = tmp
00062 
00063         !**Equilibrium IC**
00064         uvec(1) = 1.0_wp
00065         uvec(2) = 1.0_wp
00066 
00067         case('BUILD_RHS')
00068           epI = 1.0_wp / ep  !**Initialize 1/epsilon
00069           choose_RHS_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00070             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00071               resE_vec(1) = dt*(-2.0_wp*uvec(1))
00072               resE_vec(2) = dt*(uvec(1) - uvec(2) - uvec(2)*uvec(2) )
00073               resi_vec(1) = dt*(-epI*uvec(1) + epI*uvec(2)*uvec(2))
00074               resi_vec(2) = 0.0_wp
00075             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00076               resE_vec(:) = 0.0_wp
00077               resi_vec(1) = dt*(-(epI+2.0_wp)*uvec(1) + epI*uvec(2)*uvec(2))
00078               resi_vec(2) = dt*(uvec(1) - uvec(2) - uvec(2)*uvec(2) )
00079           end select choose_RHS_type
00080         
00081         case('BUILD_JACOBIAN')
00082           epI = 1.0_wp / ep  !**Initialize 1/epsilon
00083           choose_Jac_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00084             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00085               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-epI)
00086               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*( epI)*2.0_wp*uvec(2)
00087               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00088               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)            
00089             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00090               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-(epI+2.0_wp))
00091               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(+epI*2.0_wp*uvec(2))
00092               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(1.0_wp)
00093               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-(1.0_wp+2.0_wp*uvec(2)))
00094           end select choose_Jac_type
00095           
00096       end select Program_Step_Select
00097       end subroutine Kaps
00098       end module Kaps_mod
